name: kefta tajine
ingredients: 16 frozen beef meatballs (Charal) (or 500g of homemade ground beef)
steps: Prepare the sauce: Saut√© the chopped onion and garlic in a tajine dish (or a pan) for 3 minutes with olive oil.
Add half of the spices (ginger, cumin) and the chopped parsley. Mix in the crushed tomatoes, season with salt and pepper. Cook for 15 minutes.
Place the kefta meatballs in the dish.
Sprinkle with the remaining spices and parsley. Let cook for 5 minutes.
At the last moment, crack the eggs into the tajine (make small wells). Cover for 2 minutes (or until the eggs are cooked to your liking).
